The FÃƒÂ¡fnir SEV was developed for exploration missions of all lengths and durations, fuel loadout depending. It carries a working spinning centrifuge [requiring CleverBobCat/Damned Robotics modified Rotatron pivot], a communications array, the capability to carry up to four smaller craft, and its engine section comprises of both nuclear and ion engines. It is capable of operating under full thrust without damage.

It should be noted that timewarping causes the centrifuge to spin.

On its test flight, the FÃƒÂ¡fnir used 1/4 of its liquid fuel/oxidizer, and very little of its xenon gas reserve, to reach Minmus orbit. If it had been carrying landers, it could have dropped them here.
